MainHero.welcomeDescription: Find the best hospitals, book appointments, and get instant medical assistance.
MainHero.assistantGreeting: Hello! I am the MediPortal assistant. How can I help you?

MainAbout.title: About MediPortal
MainAbout.description: MediPortal is Azerbaijan's leading healthcare platform, connecting patients with the best hospitals and medical professionals across the country. Our mission is to make healthcare accessible and efficient for everyone.
